topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0: Upload an Image for Use

section.p: In order to properly create a Compute instance you need an image to use. The Helion OpenStack installer provides an Ansible playbook that will download a Cirros linux image and upload it as a public image to your image repository for use across your Projects.
